name: Beastkin
desc: When no enemy targets on field have "Beast Tongue," "Beast Tongue" is applied to random attacked target after ally targets use an attack. After enemies with "Beast Tongue" receive a total of 8 attack(s) or are defeated, they take Lightning DMG equal to 4000% base DMG, adjacent targets take DMG equal to 3000% base DMG, and all allies increase CRIT DMG by 60% and SPD by 20% for 2 turn(s). If in the "Butterfly Soul" state, then it is considered to additionally launching 1 attack(s).
